original_text: But the chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that anyone who found out where Jesus was should report it so that they might arrest him.
korean_text: 이는 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 누구든지 예수 있는 곳을 알거든 신고하여 잡게 하라 명령하였음이러라

sentences.original_text: But chief priests and Pharisees had given orders
that anyone who found out where Jesus was
so that they might arrest him.
